paragraphs.text: The cover art for the book features Aang with the Northern Water Tribe Royal Palace in the background.

paragraphs.body: Battle of the Benders in 3D (ISBN 0-375-84331-0) is a book based on the animated series ${link_0}. The book contains a summary of the characters and colorful illustrations, most of which are in 3D; to assist the reader in viewing the images, the book has attached a pair of 3D glasses. Published on January 8, 2008, it was written and illustrated by Golden Books and consists of twenty-four pages.
paragraphs.text: Battle of the Benders in 3D (ISBN 0-375-84331-0) is a book based on the animated series Avatar: The Last Airbender. The book contains a summary of the characters and colorful illustrations, most of which are in 3D; to assist the reader in viewing the images, the book has attached a pair of 3D glasses. Published on January 8, 2008, it was written and illustrated by Golden Books and consists of twenty-four pages.

paragraphs.body: Join Aang, the 12-year-old Avatar, as he battles to save the world from the war-hungry Fire Nation! This 24-page full-color book has lots of eye-popping 3-D images, activities, a 3-D panoramic poster plus two pairs of 3-D glasses–a perfect way to introduce new fans to the exciting world of Avatar: The Last Airbender!
